alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 15 at 3:01AM HST until March 15 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .Strong westerly winds are expected across the highest elevations of the Big Island today, followed be a weakening trend starting this evening. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with localized gusts over 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
